subject: Re: Design pattern in JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Kent Beck and Erich Gamma describe the patterns and design decisions for  the original JUnit in the following:
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "ntphucs" <ntphucs@...> wrote:
>
> What are the design patterns embodied in JUnit? How do they work
> together to provide a generic test framework?
>

Kent Beck and Erich Gamma describe the patterns and design decisions
for the original JUnit in the following:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/cookstour/cookstour.htm

At the 2006 JavaOne, I gave a talk with Kent on JUnit4's and its
design. You can see the slides at:

http://developers.sun.com/learning/javaoneonline/2006/tools/TS-1580.html

Alberto

http://www.JUnitFactory.com
Free, web-based, JUnit generation.
